title: Tour de France 2021 Standings after Stage 20
content:
General Classification / Yellow Jersey 

Stage 20 was one for the time trial specialists and Wout van Aert came out on top. In the GC, Tadej Pogačar simply had to make it round upright to win the second yellow jersey of his career. Jonas Vingegaard finished the Tour de France in scintillating form, ending up third on the stage. He is the only rider within seven minutes of Pogačar. Richard Carapaz will round out the podium.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Jonas Vingegaard +5:20
3. Richard Carapaz +7:03
4. Ben O'Connor +10:02
5. Wilco Kelderman +10:13
6. Enric Mas +11:43
7. Alexey Lutsenko +12:23
8. Guillaume Martin +15:33
9. Pello Bilbao +16:04
10. Rigoberto Uran +18:34

Tour de France 2021 Guide

Points Classification / Green Jersey

Michael Matthews picked up a further 9 points in the stage 19 intermediate sprint, edging slightly closer to Cavendish. The final fight for Green will commence on the Champs-Elysees on Sunday, with Cavendish in full control.

1. Mark Cavendish - 304 points
2. Michael Matthews - 269 points
3. Sonny Colbrelli - 216 points
4. Jasper Philipsen - 186 points
5. Matej Mohoric - 163 points

The Tour de France jerseys – the race so far

King of the Mountains Classification / Polka-Dot Jersey

After his wins in the mountain stages so far, Pogacar is now unreachable in the Mountain Classification. As long as he finishes the race, Pogacar will win the KOM jersey for the second year in a row.

1. Tadej Pogacar - 107 points
2. Wout Poels - 88 points
3. Jonas Vingegaard - 82 points
4. Wout van Aert - 72 points
5. Nairo Quintana - 68 points

Young Rider's Classification / White Jersey

The White Jersey competition remains the same after the time trial, with Jonas Vingegaard now the only rider within 20 minutes of Tadej Pogačar.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Jonas Vingegaard +5:20
3. David Gaudu +21:21
4.  Aurélien Paret-Peintre +39:09
5. Sergio Higuita +1:05:27

Team Classification

1. Bahrain Victorious
2. EF Education-Nippo +19:12
3. Team Jumbo Visma +1:11:35
4. INEOS Grenadiers +1:27:10
5. AG2R Citroen Team +1:31:54
